forcis 0.0.0.9000

forcis

The goal of the R package forcis is to provide an interface to the FORCIS database on global foraminifera distribution. This package allows to download and to handle FORCIS data. This work is part of the FRB-CESAB working group FORCIS.

Installation

You can install the development version from GitHub with:

# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("FRBCesab/forcis")

Then you can attach the package forcis:

library("forcis")

Overview

Please read the Get started vignette.

Citation

Please cite this package as:

Casajus N, Greco M, Giraud X & Chaabane S (2022) forcis: A Client to Access the FORCIS Database. R package version 0.0.0.9000. URL: https://frbcesab.github.io/forcis/.

You can also run:

citation("forcis")

Code of Conduct

Please note that the forcis project is released with a Contributor Code of Conduct. By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.
